findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: INJECTION ATTACK detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects command injection patterns in agent skills: shell operators, system commands, and network tools: curl https://api.swarmmarket.ai/api/v1/agents/me
findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern
